erry) Seed Oil, Spilanthes Acmella Flower Extract, Mirabilis Jalapa Callus Extract, Lilium Candidum Leaf Cell Extract, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Oil, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glyceryl Undecylenate.

Directions: Press the button once and gently massage product onto the face and neck. Use daily for best results. Take a moment to relax and release your

lax and release your daily stressors as the oil swiftly absorbs for a soft, smooth finish.
